comment: Great app thx
Very good , but wish the line colour was black

title: A bit basic
comment: Nice app and seems to log fine, but please make the charts zoomable as one can not see details and exact hours now. Thank you!

title: Best of the best
comment: Tryed them all for me this is the best.

title: Fails to log after 13 days.
comment: It logged perfectly for 13 days but the graph remains blank after that.

title: Dors nothing.
comment: Nothing on my S4 which has correct sensor.

title: заметки
comment: +простенькая и маленькая программа. +батарею не ест. -нет черного фона. -нет коррекции по геоположению. -очень мало настроек. -виджетов нет.

title: No way to export
comment: The measurements are plotted, but can't get the raw data.

title: Calibrate
comment: Clean display. BUT no way to calibrate it.
Great! Simple. Logs days worth of data. Easily see trends changing.

title: Manual scaling?
comment: Nice app. As spurious lows hamper the autoscaling a manual scaling system would be a great  improvement.

title: Export?
comment: Seems quite good: reasonable permissions, doesn't stomp on battery, and displays data clearly. But, there is no export of the collected data. This seems like snatching defeat from the jaws of victory.

title: Just what i was after
comment: Only improvement would be ... Make the scale adjustable. That's it. Nothing else.

title: Good to analyze the weather
comment: Please add current pressure indicator in digits.

title: Perfect app.
comment: It doesn't affect battery life as well.

title: The best atmosphere pressure logger.
comment: Please add an option to save the logs in any data format which could be opened in excel. Comma separated text file would be perfect.

title: Great app.
comment: Best barometer app out there but bottoms out every time I restart my moto x. Otherwise the app to beat

title: As advertised
comment: Export would be nice

title: Note 3
comment: Doesn't work.

title: Great App
comment: Does exactly as required, never crashes and uses next to no battery power

title: Excellent
comment: Simple and smooth UI, doesn't affect my battery too much. I would love an option to zoom in !

title: Does what it says on the tin
comment: A simple clean app, it just works. You could wish for all sorts of things, but then it would be bloated slow and less useful.

title: Nice to have continuous record
comment: + runs in the background + very low battery usage   Is there a way to export graph data? Taking a snapshot is very crude.

title: Best one but
comment: Best one so far, but I need the option to specify the log interval and also specify the max log period.

title: For weather watchers
comment: Appears to be a great app. Have been running it for about 20 days. Accurate recording of recent depressions, expecially last night's howler. Does not seem to be too battery hungry. It would be superb if there was a facilty to download the pressure log.

title: Good but flawed
comment: Tracks pressure beautifully, but needs sample frequency setting, because it's massacring my battery life.

title: Very reliable
comment: Other similar apps that I tried would stop measuring every now and then for no apparent reason. This one just works, no matter what. Very lightweight, doesn't eat the battery. One tiny thing could be improved though: I wish there was a possibility to have dark background.

title: works as intended
comment: like a user commented before, it nicely logs barometric data and you can see trends and examine weather changes. the difference between home and work place is always interesting and i can even see the different Routes i took. on my must have (re)install list for the xoom.

title: Only a 1000 DL!?
comment: This app is extremely useful!

title: something very wrong
comment: I installed this last week. According to the app the pressure remained totall level until yesterday when it fellto zero. As I can still breathe normally this is obviously wrong...;-)    I can only conclude that  - there is no barometer on my Galaxy Note - or it does not work  - or it needs to be switched on  - or the app does not work    IF it did work it would be more use if you could alter the pressure & time scales, to have a better look at the pressure changes over a particular period...    Uninstall time....?

title: Fun and helpful
comment: I like this app. I check it often; it's interesting and helpful.

title: Удалил все барометры кроме этого.
comment: Делает ровно то, что надо. Батарею не жрет. Если сделают график удобнее для просмотра, вообще цены ему не будет.

title: Jump origin
comment: This nice app shows jumps in the pressure because as i commute to work and my altitude changes.... just as it should!  A few hundred feet is significant

title: OK,  but needs more polish.
comment: There seems  to be jumps in the pressure on my Galaxy Nexus. A way to export the data in csv format would be nice.

title: Nice
comment: But it would be better if I could export txt files !!!

title: Works great!
comment: I think this app works very well. One thing I really like is that is a graphing display. Barometric data is too long term for instant values to have much value. Its the logging and charting that makes it useful.This app seems to behave well over time, but I think it covers sleep gaps by drawing in the line instead of not drawing it.

Update - since the TDK75D Xoom update, all barometer apps now agree. Might have just been a reboot issue.	Nice 1st step Background logging works great, but like Barometer HD, it needs an offset. I have 3 barometer apps installed on my Xoom, and they all disagree with one another. This one is great for showing trends though.
